sponsors.name: CapStorm
sponsors.description: CapStorm is a self-hosted Salesforce data management platform used to give customers a pathway to ownership and control over their Salesforce data & metadata. Since 2011 CapStorm has offered enterprise Salesforce solutions for backup & recovery, integrations, sandbox seeding, archival, security & compliance, DevOps, and data migration use cases.

sponsors.name: Formstack
sponsors.description: Formstack is a secure workplace productivity platform built to produce ingenious solutions to the everyday work that slows organizations down. From eliminating paper forms to breaking digital silos, Formstack empowers anyone to quickly and easily build custom forms, create documents, and collect eSignatures and automate workflows—all without code.

sponsors.name: PDF Butler
sponsors.description: Boost your productivity and amplify your brand identity with PDF Butler - the document generation tool designed for Salesforce. Generate, customize, and send your documents for signature with just one click.

sponsors.name: Apsona
sponsors.description: We believe that data management shouldn't be a burden, but rather an opportunity to drive growth and success. Since 2006, Apsona’s software has helped over 1,700 organizations globally streamline their data management processes with multi-step reporting, dedupe and match, and document merge. Apsona can be used by small teams as well as international organizations (SMB up to Enterprise). With a focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, Apsona is the ideal partner for organizations looking to take their Salesforce data management to the next level. Our software can be used by any Salesforce customer - any data model.

sponsors.name: Metazoa
sponsors.description: Metazoa's software solutions are and services help Salesforce Administrators find, fix, and maintain orgs. Our services specialize in org splits, merges, and reboots and our tool, Snapshot, helps with org management, maintenance and optimization.

sponsors.name: FormAssembly
sponsors.description: FormAssembly is a trusted enterprise data collection platform that empowers security-conscious organizations to drive mission-critical business initiatives and become better stewards of their data. Our platform helps customers of all skill levels build efficient data collection workflows while meeting the high security and compliance standards of regulated industries. Used by thousands of organizations, FormAssembly integrates seamlessly with other commonly used systems to streamline processes and drive business results.

sponsors.name: Valence
sponsors.description: 100% Native Integrations. No third-party server. No third-party access. Familiar controls inside your own Salesforce environment. Diagnostic tools more helpful than you ever thought possible. Natively trigger reports and notifications from Salesforce. Gov Cloud certified. Nonprofit Organizations receive discount. License covers full org and has no traffic limitations.

sponsors.name: KnowledgeNet.ai
sponsors.description: KnowledgeNet.ai is an AI-powered tool that connects you to the relationships and insights you need to make actionable intelligence decisions to grow and manage your business faster.

sponsors.name: SUMO Scheduler
sponsors.description: Salesforce Native Online Appointment, Event & Field Sales Booking

sponsors.name: Azimuth DS LLC
sponsors.description: Azimuth DS LLC empowers businesses with Salesforce expertise, enhancing CRM efficiency and cost-effectiveness. Our services include System Administration, Custom App Development, and innovative tools like Telescope for data capture. Streamline rental sales with our upcoming Rental App. Navigate Salesforce with Azimuth DS!

sponsors.name: Tricentis
sponsors.description: Tricentis is a global leader in continuous testing and quality engineering. The Tricentis AI-powered, continuous testing platform provides a new and fundamentally different way to perform software testing. An approach that’s totally automated, fully codeless, and intelligently driven by AI. It addresses both agile development and complex enterprise apps, enabling enterprises to accelerate their digital transformation by dramatically increasing software release speed, reducing costs, and improving software quality. Widely credited for reinventing software testing for DevOps, cloud, and enterprise applications, Tricentis has been recognized as a leader by major industry analysts, including Forrester, Gartner, and IDC. Tricentis has more than 2,500 customers, including the largest brands in the world, such as McKesson, Accenture, Allianz, Telstra, Dolby, and Vodafone.

sponsors.name: Provar
sponsors.description: Provar offers solutions to support you on your expedition to quality. We provide integrated quality management, maintainable test automation, release governance, and outstanding support to teams using complex systems like Salesforce. Our suite of low-code products improve release agility, reduce system defects, and advance innovation. Visit us at www.provar.com

sponsors.name: DataGroomr
sponsors.description: With DataGroomr's AI algorithms, identifying and eliminating duplicates within Salesforce and during imports has never been easier. Plus, it includes verification and transformation tools to help you achieve data clarity effortlessly.

sponsors.name: SharinPix
sponsors.description: SharinPix apps make it possible to create and configure your own optimized use of images and PDFs in all your Salesforce business processes, without code!

sponsors.name: Growth Heroes
sponsors.description: As a boutique Salesforce consulting firm, Growth Heroes partners with companies to optimize processes and integrate systems through digital transformation to help them scale and grow earnings. Our areas of expertise include sales, marketing, app development, analytics, community building, and service. With employees across the country, our team is ready to take on your next project, no matter where you might be located.

sponsors.name: Sonar
sponsors.description: Purpose built for Ops teams, Sonar visualizes your Salesforce blueprint for more intelligent change management. With automated change tracking across your CRM metadata & proactive alerts on any update, both your RevOps team & business leaders can feel confident in the changes being made to their most valuable business system.
